option.title: Splunk for Websphere Application Server app
option.summary: This app indexes Websphere Application Server logs and metrics. It also contains dashboards and searches for Websphere Application Server data.

option.title: J2EE data your Splunk server can access
option.summary: Add any J2EE data on the Splunk server to Splunk.

option.title: J2EE data your Splunk server can't access
option.summary: Use Splunk's universal forwarder to forward J2EE data from any machine to your Splunk server.
